bpp/descriptor.name: OOGASHOP
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Free GST Billing , Inventory Management and ONDC store for your shop. Works on any device. Contact +917388974291 to bring your shop on ONDC.

descriptor.name: Baby Moist Cream
descriptor.long_desc: AVEENO Baby Soothing Relief Moisture Cream contains ACTIVE NATURAL Colloidal Oats Formula and rich emollients that soothe dry, irritable skin. It is clinically proven to moisturize for 24 hours and soothe dry skin. This formula absorbs quickly and is gentle enough new-borns delicate skin as well. It is hypoallergenic and fragrance free. AVEENO uses select natural ingredients because of their advanced benefits. These are called ACTIVE NATURALS , natural ingredients uniquely formulated to deliver visible results. Scientists at AVEENO follow highest standards of ingredient selection, formulation and manufacturing, with processes that retain the strength and purity of such ingredients. Today, AVEENO brand is most trusted for its use of natural ingredients. As a skin protectant, active ingredient, oatmeal can help restore skin's normal pH and aid in the maintenance of skin's moisture barrier to help prevent and protect dry skin. Carefully extracted from the oat kernel, ACTIVE NATURAL Oat Extract contain 5 vital ingredients also found naturally in healthy baby skin.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: Johnson & Johnson KOREA LTD, JOHNSON & JOHNSON KOREA LTD, 61, daesin-ro 164 beon-gil, Heungdeok-gu,Cheongju-si, Chungcheongbuk-do, Korea, 1800-228-111

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_prepackaged_foo.ingredients_info: Enriched with Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Glycerin, and Beeswax, this cream locks in moisture while protecting the skin's natural barrier

descriptor.name: Bab Moist Loton
descriptor.short_desc: Aveeno Baby Daily Moisturising Lotion, 227 gm
descriptor.long_desc: Aveeno Baby Daily Moisturising Lotion is perfect for baby's delicate skin. US No.1 Paediatrician Recommended Aveeno Baby Body Lotion comes with active natural oats formula which protects and nourishes sensitive skin for 24 hours. A daily dose of softness for kids; nourish and protect babyâ€™s skin 24 hours a day. With soothing natural Oat Extra, it helps prevent and temporarily protect chafed, chapped or cracked skin. It is hypoallergenic, fragrance-free and dye-free.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: Johnson & Johnson Consumer Inc, USA, Johnson & Johnson Consumer Inc, Skillman NJ 08558 ,USA, 1800-228-111

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_prepackaged_foo.ingredients_info: Oat flour's calming properties, glycerin's moisturizing magic, and dimethicone's protective shield come together to create a harmonious blend, addressing dryness and preserving the skin's natural moisture barrier for overall skin health.

descriptor.name: Baby Almod Oil
descriptor.long_desc: Indus valley bio-organic almond oil is 100% organic and is clinically tested to be chemical free. It contains no hexane, no Paraben, and no sulphates. This lightweight almond oil happens to be cold pressed and is derived by the most natural process. It can be used by both men and women owing to its multipurpose beauty benefits. 'Indus valley bio-organic almond oil' being rich in antioxidants, fatty acids and vitamins A, B and E makes it an amazing solution that helps to lighten the dark circles. It works as an effective remedy to combat dull and damaged hair and helps to nourish the scalp and hair follicles right from the roots which further adds a healthy shine to the dull tresses. Almond oil cold pressed for hair beauty improves the elasticity of hair and softens them. In terms of skin care, it helps to make the skin soft and smooth due to its excellent moisturizing and skin nourishing qualities. Being base oil, this solution is blended with other essential oils in the field of aromatherapy and for the rejuvenating hair and body massages.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: Indus Cosmeceuticals Pvt. Ltd., 79 Industrial area, Shoghi, Shimla, 173219 (Himachal Pradesh)

descriptor.name: Instant hand sanitizer original
descriptor.long_desc: Your Trusted Dettol offers a new and improved Dettol Hand Sanitiser that is rinsed free and non-sticky. It has an enhanced fragrance with better coverage. It is specially formulated to protect you from 100 illness-causing germs. With an easy application drop bottle, you can protect yourself and your family from a wide range of illness-causing germs anytime, anywhere without soap or water. Keeping germs at bay with Dettolâ€™s on-the-go instant hand sanitiser packs is easy. It is, in addition, enriched with moisturisers that donâ€™t let your hands dry up and leave them 99.9 per cent germ-free. These sanitiser bottles are convenient to carry and can be placed anywhere from your pocket, purse or bag for on-the-go convenience. Dettol Instant Hand Sanitisers are perfect for the season of sneezes and sniffles, winters! the time when playtime turns into snack-time when the crowd is unavoidable and the food too the time when you plan to have dinner on the mid-trip when cough should not be stopping your work So remember! No need to worry, you have Dettol by your side. Try one by Dettol today and we guarantee you will keep the germs far away!

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: Reckitt Benckiser, Plot No. 48, Institutional Area, Sector 32, Gurugram, Haryana 122001
